IX.iii.1.G.5.d
.
Beneficiaries Affected by Natural Disasters
Victims of natural disasters may have lost or misplaced many of their possessions, including personal documents and records.  Such a situation could make it especially difficult to obtain provider proof of their reported medical expenses.
Natural disasters include, but are not limited to
hurricanes
tornados
floods
wildfires, and
earthquakes.
Note
:  If residence in an area affected by a natural disaster is established, VA may concede a claimant's loss of records to verify their reported medical expenses.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section G - Pension - Deductible Medical Expenses
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section G
